snippet: Alison Redford, the Alberta premier, said critics of the Keystone XL project had exaggerated the impact of developing the oil.
abstract: Alison Redford, premier of Canada's Alberta province, lobbies on behalf of Keystone XL pipeline project during her fourth trip to Washington in 18 months; argues that critics of project have distorted its environmental effects and exaggerated environmental impact of developing oil.
lead_paragraph: Alison Redford, the Alberta premier, said critics of the Keystone XL project had exaggerated the impact of developing the oil.

headline.seo: Canadian Official in U.S. to Push Keystone XL
headline.main: Canadian Visits U.S. to Promote Oil Pipeline
headline.print_headline: Canadian Visits U.S. To Promote Oil Pipeline
